transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Railwork Paper Private Limited.
Customer: Haan, bol rahe hain.
Executive: Suvito Biswas ji, very good afternoon. Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke behalf mein, senior manager.
Customer: Sir, aapka hierarchy kaun sa hai L1, L2, L3, L4?
Executive: Yes, meri team mein Mr. Rahul hai jiske paas aapka account hai aur main uska senior baat kar raha hun aur mere se upar hai Mr. Himanshu ji jo mere businessman hai.
Customer: Mujhe aap logon ke team se, aap logon ke team se main baat karne ke liye bola hun.
Executive: Okay. Haan, aapki side se hamare paas ek morning mein concern bhi raise hue hain. Also previous time mein aapke side se ek concern tha ki aapko to aap logon se main baat karne bola hun.
Customer: Aap kya pagal hai kya hai? Aapki side se aapne bola tha, humne try bhi kiya tha. Logon ko pagal bana ke aap log paise le rahe hain.
Executive: Sorry for the inconvenience. Sala aapka hi to senior pagal bana raha hai Himanshu.
Customer: Awaz kam. Sorry for the inconvenience. Sir, aap jo concern hai aapki side se. Na na, jo concern hai mera paisa mujhe refund kab tak milega nahi to main iske baad consumer forum mein bhi case thokunga aur isme bhi case dalunga.
Executive: Sir, hamari ladke ki taraf se galti hua tha jisme aapko due date. Ladka, Himanshu ladka hai aapka? Aapka senior hai ladka hai wo?
Executive: Aapko sir ki side se batayenge ki sir usme ye hua hoga ki jab Rahul ne call transfer kiya na us time Himanshu sir. Natak mat kijiye mujhe aap logon se suniye mujhe aap logon se baat nahi karna hai aapka complaint team se mujhe baat karna hai.
Customer: Nahi to iske baad case jayega consumer forum mein. Itne din se bol rahe ho paisa ka refund aa ja raha hai ye aa raha hai, natak kar rahe ho.
Executive: Aisi koi baat nahi hai sir. Yahan pe jo ab aapka jo discussion hoga na jo aap customer care ki jo baat kar rahe hain to wahan pe Himanshu sir ke senior ki aap se discuss karna kar sakte hain aur agar aap chahte hain ki unse senior to wahan pe customer care ko to specific wahan pe nahi hoga.
Customer: Mujhe customer care mein baat karna hai mujhe L4 level ke kisi se baat karna hai. Aap logon se kisi se mujhe muh hi nahi lagna hai. Chor kahin ke.
Executive: Sir, jo concern hua na uske bare mein main aapko bata deta hun. Aap log chor hai. Ek baat sun lijiye aap log aap log zara sa chori kar rahe hain.
Customer: Mujhe L4 level ke kisi se baat karna hai mujhe aap logon se faltu muh hi nahi lagana hai.
Executive: Sir, aap thoda sa samajhne ki try kariye ki jo galti hua hai ladke ki taraf se. Mujhe baat nahi karna hai mujhe aap logon ka customer care mein baat karna hai.
Customer: Thik hai, okay. Arrange karwa rahe hain.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of money.

- Wants to talk to L4 level executive.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to explain the issue.

- Agreed to arrange a call with customer care.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, customer care, l4 level, complaint
